ReflectionData.reflections: in this unit we went back to the simple basics of flutter refreshing our minds on how to use widgets such as Text, Texfields, Buttons and SnackBar.

in this unit we went through state management. As explained that a state is the condition or changes happening to a particular widget on the screen (this can be in a form of providing data to a textfield), we had to see how we can manage those changes. As we saw in unit one there is an option for setState(),
